Description:
Learn how to use the git config command to set your username and email so you get credit for your work. Plus, we show you how to create custom aliases to speed up your workflow and type less.

#git #codingtips #developer

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

About GitHub It’s where over 180 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: How to configure git and create aliases
Author: GitHub
